transcript: what will people think if I don't go home they'll think you've changed and you have and so then the question becomes is what I have to gain more than what I stand to lose and if you continue to gain in your new environment and you continue to lose in your old environment then I would say yes even if you were communicating this to them let me give you a little phrase that you can use I'm not saying this is forever I'm saying this is for now and so whatever change you're communicating it can make it seem less permanent by saying it's not saying it's forever I'm just saying it's for now
